nodes.beat: Dr. Victor, a Minecraft player, decides to build a gigantic creature using blocks.
Victor collects various blocks and starts building the creature.
After days of hard work, Victor finally completes his creation, which he calls 'The Monster'.
The Monster, once activated, starts behaving aggressively, destroying the village.
Victor, realizing his mistake, decides to deactivate The Monster.
Victor fights The Monster, finally managing to deactivate it and saving the village.
Dr. Victor, a Minecraft player, decides to build a gigantic creature using Redstone.
The creature, once activated, starts behaving unpredictably, causing chaos.
Victor, realizing the creature is out of control, decides to dismantle it.
Victor fights the creature, finally managing to dismantle it and restoring peace.
Victor collects rare blocks and starts building the creature.
The Monster, once activated, starts behaving oddly, causing confusion among the villagers.
Victor, realizing his creation is causing fear, decides to modify The Monster.
Victor fights The Monster, finally managing to modify it and calming the villagers.
Victor collects rare Redstone and starts building the creature.
Victor, realizing the creature is out of control, decides to reprogram it.
Victor fights the creature, finally managing to reprogram it and restoring peace.
